long_description: Balmy summer nights just got a lot nicer with this fan from Coleman(R), designed to keep a cooling breeze moving through your tent all night long. Two-speed fan delivers powerful air movement to enhance comfort inside tents and cabins. Freestanding design folds compactly for storage and transport. Operates up to 21 hours on four D-size alkaline batteries. Soft, pliable fan blade enhances safety.
short_description: Balmy summer nights just got a lot nicer with this fan from Coleman(R), designed to keep a cooling breeze moving through your tent all night long.
